formalpara.title: Figure 3. EGF repeats structure from human Notch1.
formalpara.para: Ribbon diagram of EGF repeats 11-13 from human Notch1 (PDB ID: 2VJ3). Repeats 11, 12, and 13 are colored green, yellow, and magenta, respectively. Disulfide bonds are represented as grey sticks and bound calcium ions are cyan spheres.
